text.0: agni at dawn and indra we invoke at dawn and varuṇa and mitra and the aśvins twain.
text.1: bhaga at dawn pūṣan and brahmaṇaspati soma at dawn rudra we will invoke at dawn.
text.2: we will invoke strong earlyconquering bhaga the son of aditi the great supporter.
text.3: thinking of whom the poor yea even the mighty even the king himself says give me bhaga.
text.4: bhaga our guide bhaga whose gifts are faithful favour this song and give us wealth o bhaga.
text.5: bhaga augment our store of kine and horses bhaga may we be rich in men and heroes.
text.6: so may felicity be ours at present and when the day approaches and at noontide.
text.7: and may we still o bounteous one at sunset be happy in the deities lovingkindness.
text.8: may bhaga verily be blissbestower and through him gods may happiness attend us.
text.9: as such o bhaga all with might invoke thee as such be thou our champion here o bhaga.
text.10: to this our worship may all dawns incline them and come to the pure place like dadhikrāvan.
text.11: as strong steeds draw a chariot may they bring us hitherward bhaga who discovers treasure.
text.12: may blessed mornings dawn on us for ever with wealth of kine of horses and of heroes.
text.13: streaming with all abundance pouring fatness preserve us evermore ye gods with blessings.
